required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of LY3499446 in Participants With Advanced Solid Tumors With KRAS G12C Mutation
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1/2 Study of LY3499446 Administered to Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors With KRAS G12C Mutation

brief_summary.textblock: The reason for this study is to see if the study drug LY3499446 is safe and effective in participants with solid tumors with KRAS G12C mutation.

clinical_study.why_stopped: The study was terminated due to an unexpected toxicity finding.

primary_outcome.measure: Phase 1: Number or Participants with Dose Limiting Toxicities (DLTs)
primary_outcome.description: Phase 1: Number or Participants with DLTs

primary_outcome.measure: Phase 2: Overall Response Rate (ORR): Percentage of Participants Who Achieve Complete Response (CR) or Partial Response (PR) (CRC Cohorts and Other Tumors Cohort)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline through Measured Progressive Disease (Estimated up to 24 Months)
primary_outcome.description: Phase 2: ORR: Percentage of Participants Who Achieve CR or PR (CRC Cohorts and Other Tumors Cohort)

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Objective Progression or Death Due to Any Cause (Estimated up to 24 Months)

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK): Average Concentration at Steady State of LY3499446
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose Cycle 1 Day 1 through Cycle 3 Day 1 (21 Day Cycles)
secondary_outcome.description: PK: Average Concentration at Steady State of LY3499446

secondary_outcome.measure: PK: Average Concentration at Steady State of LY3499446 in Combination with Abemaciclib
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose Cycle 1 Day 1 through Cycle 3 Day 1 (21 Day Cycles)
secondary_outcome.description: PK: Average Concentration at Steady State of LY3499446 in Combination with Abemaciclib

secondary_outcome.measure: PK: Average Concentration at Steady State of LY3499446 in Combination with Cetuximab
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose Cycle 1 Day 1 through Cycle 3 Day 1 (21 Day Cycles)
secondary_outcome.description: PK: Average Concentration at Steady State of LY3499446 in Combination with Cetuximab

secondary_outcome.measure: PK: Average Concentration at Steady State of LY3499446 in Combination with Erlotinib
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose Cycle 1 Day 1 through Cycle 3 Day 1 (21 Day Cycles)
secondary_outcome.description: PK: Average Concentration at Steady State of LY3499446 in Combination with Erlotinib

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase 1: ORR: Percentage of Participants Who Achieve CR or PR
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline through Measured Progressive Disease (Estimated up to 24 Months)
secondary_outcome.description: Phase 1: ORR: Percentage of Participants Who Achieve CR or PR

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Objective Progression or Death Due to Any Cause (Estimated up to 24 Months)
Date of CR or PR to Date of Disease Progression or Death Due to Any Cause (Estimated up to 24 Months)

secondary_outcome.measure: Disease Control Rate (DCR): Percentage of Participants with a Best Overall Response of CR, PR, and SD
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline through Measured Progressive Disease (Estimated up to 24 Months)
secondary_outcome.description: Disease Control Rate (DCR): Percentage of Participants with a Best Overall Response of CR, PR, and SD

arm_group.description: Participants given LY3499446 and abemaciclib orally.
Participants given LY3499446 orally and cetuximab intravenously (IV).
Participants given LY3499446 and erlotinib orally.
Participants given LY3499446 and abemaciclib orally.
Participants given LY3499446 and erlotinib orally.
Participants given LY3499446 orally and cetuximab IV.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Participants must have diagnosis of a solid tumor with KRAS G12C mutation that did not respond to at least 1 line of standard therapy and has spread to other part(s) of the body
- For phase II, participants must be willing to have new tumor tissue biopsies (doctor removes a small amount of tissue) during the study if it does not cause undue risks to health
- Participants must be willing to use highly effective birth control
- Participants must have adequate organ function
- Participants must be able to swallow capsules
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participants must not have certain infections such as hepatitis or tuberculosis or HIV that is not well controlled
- Participants must not have another serious medical condition including a serious heart condition, such as congestive heart failure, unstable angina pectoris, or heart attack within the last three months
- Participants must not have cancer of the central nervous system that is not stable
- Participants must not be pregnant or breastfeeding
- Participants must not use herbal supplements

facility.name: Indiana Univ Melvin & Bren Simon Cancer Center

link.description: A Study of LY3499446 in Participants With Advanced Solid Tumors With KRAS G12C Mutation

patient_data.ipd_description: Anonymized individual patient level data will be provided in a secure access environment upon approval of a research proposal and a signed data sharing agreement.
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: Data are available 6 months after the primary publication and approval of the indication studied in the US and EU, whichever is later. Data will be indefinitely available for requesting.
patient_data.ipd_access_criteria: A research proposal must be approved by an independent review panel and researchers must sign a data sharing agreement.
